author: andy
msg: Incorrect path for seeking out the location mapping.
Need to use the style expected of the new locators

author: brett
msg: Web roles and worker roles should include system scoped dependencies, as
these are often generated by the Visual Studio Addin for framework libraries
that have not been installed to a Maven repository and are installed to a
consistent location, including the Azure SDK itself.

author: brett
msg: [NPANDAY-480] Include cmd files for web role startup
